```{r setup}
library(miniLNM)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
example_data <- lnm_data()
xy <- bind_cols(example_data[c("X", "y")])
fit <- lnm(starts_with("y") ~ starts_with("x"), xy)
```

```{r}
p_hat <- predict(fit)
y_star <- sample(fit, depth = 200)
```

```{r}
newx <- lnm_data()$X
p_hat <- predict(fit, newx)
y_star <- sample(fit, newdata = newx, depth = 200)
```
